summary: This is an email forwarding the plaintiff's opposition to a stay motion in a legal case, sent by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York. The document appears to be part of ongoing litigation related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email forwarding the plaintiff's opposition to a stay motion. Works in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Filing of plaintiff's opposition to stay motion
events.description: The plaintiff filed opposition to a motion for stay in the legal proceedings.

locations.description: Office location of the Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 28, 2020, forwarding legal opposition to a stay motion.
The correspondence originates from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The attached document is dated August 27, 2020, indicating recent legal activity in the case.
The document reference EFTA00016285 suggests it is part of the Epstein-related document collection.
